alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 1:45PM EDT until August 26 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WORCESTER AND EAST CENTRAL FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 144 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Petersham, or 7 miles southeast of Orange, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...55 to 60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Gardner, Athol, Winchendon, Templeton, Westminster, Ashburnham, Barre, Hubbardston, Princeton, Shutesbury, Phillipston, Royalston, Petersham and New Salem. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
